Hamadou Djibo Issaka (amụrụ ya na 3 Julaị 1977) bụ onye Nijeria na-eme ihe egwuregwu.  Onye na-egwu egwuregwu mmiri na asọmpi, Djibo Issaka zụrụ dị ka onye na-akwọ ụgbọ mmiri maka Summer Olympics nke afọ 2012 na London iji were ebe mmepe nke Kọmitii Olympic International nyere ndị otu Naijiria.

Djibou Issaka, onye na-elekọta ubi na onye na-arụ ọrụ n'ọdọ mmiri, bụ onye Niger họọrọ ka ọ zụọ dị ka onye na-agba ọsọ naanị ọnwa atọ tupu 2012 Summer Olympics, na-enweta ọzụzụ mbụ ya na asọmpi ịkwọ ụgbọ mmiri na Egypt, wee nọrọ ọnwa abụọ na International Rowing Development Centre na Tunisia.  A họpụtara ya maka kaadị na-enweghị isi site na IOC Tripartite Commission, na-agbakwunye ya na ọdọ mmiri zuru ezu nke ndị na-akwọ ụgbọ mmiri ruru eru, na mmemme nke na-achọ ịzụlite egwuregwu na-abụghị ndị asọmpi ọdịnala
Ọ zụrụ n'obodo Belgium nke Hazewinkel, tupu mmeghe egwuregwu ahụ.

Na 28 Julaị, Djibo Issaka nwetara nlebara anya mgbasa ozi zuru oke maka mpụta mbụ ya n'egwuregwu Olympic na 2000 mita otu scullls okpomọkụ, bụ nke ọ gwụchara na oge nke 8:25.56, ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ otu nkeji n'azụ onye asọmpi ya kacha nso na ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ 1 nkeji iri anọ sekọnd n'azụ

Ndị nta akụkọ Britain nyere Djibo Issaka mmasị na-esochi ọdịdị mbụ ya, jiri ya tụnyere onye na-egwu mmiri Equiguinean Eric "the Eel" Moussambani si Sydney 2000, ma nye Djibo Issaka aha nickname nke "Issaka the Otter", "Hamadou The Keel," na  "Sculling Sloth
Ka ìgwè mmadụ na ndị nta akụkọ na-eto ya, onye na-akwọ ụgbọ mmiri Olympic Gold Medal nke Britain bụ Steve Redgrave katọrọ ntinye Djibo Issaka
N'agbanyeghị nkwupụta ndị a, IOC kọwara na Djibo Issaka ewepụghị ọnọdụ onye ọ bụla ọzọ ruru eru, mana ọ bụ otu n'ime ọtụtụ ndị Olympians gbakwunyere na ebe ndị ọzọ e mepụtara mgbe ha ruru eru.
N'ozuzu, Djibo Issaka gbara ọsọ na agba nke anọ nke asọmpi ahụ, na-agwụ na ọnọdụ ikpeazụ na asọmpi ọ bụla ahụ.
